title: This is a real problem
body:
It shouldn't be possible to be this tanky AND have enough AP to have a 800/900 damage ult... (not to mention all the other abilities) 

This damn tank meta, has made tanks into assassins, and it just isn't right.
Tanks are for absorbing damage, Mages/Assassins/ADC's are for giving it. You don't see Vayne building tank and doing lots of damage, so why should you see Naught/Blitz/Garen/Cho/etc etc building damage and still being a tank..

And I'm not lying, he could pretty much 1 shot everyone on the team except leona, and he wasn't even fed.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Tanks should be hard to kill and have cc. In no way should they be able to 1v1 an ADC and out DPS them and still live with 80%+ health. There has been an ADC update and a mage update overhaul. So perhaps tanks are next? I'd like to see more tanks focussed purely on being in the way contributing to CC and just being hard to kill with little to no damage.
I hate the meta, too. It makes tanky people Overpowered. I hope the next season's meta is better. (And maybe my friend will stop spamming {{champion:102}} every 1v1!!!)

I mean, you should really be looking at what champions burst down tanks the easiest and incorporate tank busting items into the build to further your cause. Don't get me wrong, I hate the tank meta, but there are plenty of things that can be done to essentially remove them.

Kindred is already my main Jungler and Azir is my main champion. 

So I'm fairly covered in that respect, but it still doesn't stop a 900 dmg targetable ultimate.

I assume you are not playing ranked yet or are in a lower tier. Look into your item build, there is no reason a naut has enough ap to oneshot anyone but an adc. Are you building any defensive items midlane? Are you building maw on kindred? I'd look at your itemization before looking at your enemies, best way to improve and learn cause and effect in this game.

I'd recommend trying out {{champion:48}} **Trundle** in the jungle instead of **Kindred**, and {{champion:90}} **Malzahar** mid lane instead of **Azir**. They are top of their class for dealing with tanks.

Follow these guides for ultimate tank shedding power [here](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/malzahar-victory-beckonzzz-386934) and [here](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/trundle-season-6-time-to-start-an-ice-age-443443).
